item.title: YouTube Content Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a passionate, talented video editor to work with multiple YouTube content creators (our niche is mainly Pickleball, but we also have other niches)!

We are looking for editors WHO CAN MEET DEADLINES, PAY KEEN ATTENTION TO DETAILS like spelling, and apply revisions from previous versions. This specification is due to previous challenges with editors missing details and client/team feedback from earlier versions.

If you are shortlisted, you'll be invited to do a trial task. The payment for this trial task is $20, and you will edit a Pickleball-related video and provide a 3-minute clip to show us your skills and creativity.

When hired, you will be paid:
• $150: Long form + 4 repurposed short forms
• $100: Long form only
• $20: Per additional repurposed short form (in excess of the first 4 shorts)
• $25: Per standalone short form

These rates include unlimited revisions (but typically 1-3 revisions per video). Long form videos typically range from 8-20 minutes in length, while short form videos are 60 seconds max.

Please watch this video before submitting a job proposal to ensure you can provide the required level of editing: https://youtu.be/g2ByJMmUP4A

Be sure to include a link to your portfolio.

We look forward to hearing from you and welcoming you to the team! Please respond with "rain and thunder" as the first word in your job description if you've read this far.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Blender, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Social Media Video, YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Blender, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Filming 5 Hours of Video in Coquitlam, BC Canada - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer Saturday June 22 to capture 5 hours of video footage for various projects. The filming will include a podcast session, documenting the experience of eating some rare foods, capturing board breaking moments, and filming barefoot hiking scenes in the woods. The videographer should have experience in outdoor and indoor filming, as well as the ability to handle different lighting conditions. Attention to detail and the ability to capture high-quality footage is a must. The ideal candidate should also have good communication skills and be able to work effectively with our team.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Lighting
- Editing
- Communication
- Attention to detail

Hourly Range: $30.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:08 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Strategy Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Our YouTube Growth Agency is hiring!

We are looking for a YouTube Strategy Specialist to help support our clients. Please read this job post IN FULL before responding.

We serve content creators that don’t simply “post videos”, but instead, they want to grow YouTube channels that operate as full-blown Content Businesses.

This means important pillars of our client’s channels are:
1. Succeed in growing within a specific niche/reaching their target audience
2. Monetize outside of YouTube AdSense with Brand Sponsors, Digital Products & Services, and Affiliates
3. Use YouTube as a “Top of Funnel” way to generate leads for their business/grow their email list

This position will pay starting at $450 per client per month, and each Strategy Specialist will be responsible for a pod of 8-10 clients.

This is NOT an entry-level position. Although training will be provided, YouTube Strategy experience and the ability to get results its a requirement.

As a YouTube Strategy Specialist, you’ll be responsible for:
• Customizing our proprietary YouTube Growth Strategy to the needs of your individual clients
          ◦ This will include things like video idea generation, improving click-through rate, integrating their brand identity into their content, recommending calls to action that generate leads for their business, and more
          ◦ Working directly with clients via Zoom meetings and Loom recordings to educate them about their growth strategy and work with them to personalize and finalize it
• Work with the Video Editing Team to ensure best-practices for performance are implemented (you will not do the editing, you will provide feedback on video revisions)
• Work with the Click-Through-Rate Team to ideate for titles and thumbnails (you will not do the designing, you will assist with ideation)
• If you’ve read the job description this far, please remember the code word “thunder” and type it in your cover letter
• Provide feedback on client’s filming set up & on-camera presence
• Provide feedback on client’s scripts, to ensure the Growth Strategy is implemented
• Track KPIs such as subscribers added, main traffic source (search, browse, etc), click through rate, average view duration, and more.

If you are well-qualified for this position and interested in applying, you'll be shortlisted and will be invited to do a $50 trial task.

We look forward to hearing from you,

Shannen
Li Media Hiring Team

Budget: $450
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:03 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Strategy, Content Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Marketing Plan
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Strategy, Content Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Marketing Plan
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Descript Video Editor (Use my account) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an AI-savvy video editor to join our team. Your primary task will be editing screen recording videos, adding AI-generated enhancements, and ensuring smooth, engaging content.

We use DESCRIPT AI video editor. Most videos can be edited in about 1-2 hours per video. You will have access to our paid descript account.

Requirements:
Proficiency in AI video editing tools
Experience with screen recording video edits
Attention to detail
Quick turnaround times

Hourly Range: $12.00-$24.00

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Urgent Video Creator NEEDED - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Creator who can produce high-quality videos for our business. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging videos that effectively communicate our brand message. You will be responsible for conceptualizing, planning, and executing video projects from start to finish. The videos will be used for various marketing campaigns, social media platforms, and our website.

SAMPLE VIDEO LIKE THIS IN THIS LANDING PAGE: https://aroflo.com/integrations/xero-integration
  

Requirements:
  
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar
  
- Knowledge of video production techniques and best practices
  
- Ability to storyboard and create visually appealing video content
  
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  
- Excellent communication skills to collaborate with team members and clients
  

If you have a passion for creating compelling videos and have a strong portfolio to showcase your work, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us take our video content to the next level!

Budget: $8
Posted On: June 21, 2024 05:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Car Dashcam Video Reordering project - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking enthusiastic individuals from around the world to join our project as Dashcam Video Recorders. The task involves recording high-resolution videos using a car dashcam while driving in various locations within your country. This is a great opportunity for anyone who enjoys driving and wants to earn extra income by simply recording their journeys.
Responsibilities:
Record high-quality, high-resolution videos using a car dashcam.
Ensure the videos are clear, stable, and provide a good view of the surroundings.
Capture videos in different locations within your country, including urban areas, highways, and rural roads.
Submit the recorded videos as per the guidelines provided.
Requirements:
Access to a car equipped with a high-resolution dashcam.
Ability to record videos in different parts of your country.
Attention to detail to ensure video quality meets the required standards.
Reliable internet connection to upload the recorded videos.
Payment:
The rate for this task is $2 per hour of recorded video.
Payments will be made upon the successful submission and verification of the videos.
How to Apply:
If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your application with the following details:
Your name and contact information.
The make and model of your dashcam.
The regions or cities where you can record videos.
Any previous experience with similar tasks (not mandatory).
Join us in this exciting project and get paid to explore your surroundings while helping us collect valuable data from different parts of the world!


Posted On: June 21, 2024 05:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: India
click to apply

The review should include your personal experience with the console by using an informal customer tone.

item.title: Voice over for YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced Voice Over Editor needed for a youtube channel about Cars. We want to create videos similar to:

https://youtu.be/-78xvuvc5xU?si=ARjd6QFcjWeziWSl

- The videos will be around 10-minutes long
- Scripts around 1500-1800 words
- Looking to do 3-4 per week to begin with

Requirements:
- Good American Accent
- Enthusiastic on Car
- Good communication skills
- Fast response & turnaround time
- Being able to find source material & references

Please do not apply if you don't have experience on Voice Over Editing for youtube channels.

Looking forward to working with you!
MILE
